title: Carbon Fire free Watch Face
summary: An explosive mixture of carbon fiber and fire on your watch.
description: Carbon fire Watch Face only for rectangular watches !!! An explosive mixture of carbon fiber and fire on your watch .Supports Sony Smartwatch 3, LG G Watch, Asus Zenwatch, Samsung Gear Live and all devices on Android Wear with a square screen. Large numbers and letters are clearly visible both in interactive and in the background.Watch Face Features:* Digital 24-hour Clock* Second time * Date, day and month* Wear battery indicator* Futuristic design and indicators Made for Sony Smartwatch 3, but works on any Android Wear 5.0+
descriptionHTML:
Carbon fire Watch Face only for rectangular watches !!!
An explosive mixture of carbon fiber and fire on your watch .
Supports Sony Smartwatch 3, LG G Watch, Asus Zenwatch, Samsung Gear Live and all devices on Android Wear with a square screen. Large numbers and letters are clearly visible both in interactive and in the background.
Watch Face Features:
* Digital 24-hour Clock
* Second time
* Date, day and month
* Wear battery indicator
* Futuristic design and indicators
Made for Sony Smartwatch 3, but works on any Android Wear 5.0+
